Posts.EditableText:
Hi
 
I'm relatively new to Squiffy and I have created a prototype story but I cannot seem to build it correctly. I allowed third-party cookies and data and I also allowed blocked content on all browsers but when I hit 'Build', only the blank page shows up except for the "restart" link at the right-hand corner. Is there any solution to this??

Thanks
